titleStmt.title: A tragi-comicall history of our times, under the borrowed names of Lisander and Calista
Histoire trage-comique de nostre temps, sous les noms de Lysandre et de Caliste. English
titleStmt.author: Audiguier, Vital d', 1569-1624.
Duncomb, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Y[oung] for G. Lathum, at the Bishops head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Audiguier, Vital d', Sieur de la Ménor. Histoire trage-comique de nostre temps, sous les noms de Lysandre et de Caliste.
Translator's dedication signed: W.D., i.e. William Duncomb.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Bishops head in Paules Church-yard
